title: [Bard Guild, Courtyard]
description: A sturdy split-rail fence surrounds the neat courtyard.  The snow has been shoveled away from the center, revealing a surface paved in riverstone.  Embedded in the riverstone and reflecting the moonlight, small silver stepping stones depict a large treble clef.  A private yet inviting atmosphere is created by the evergreen shrubs lining the fence.  The low building at one end displays a marquee over the carved door, beneath large luminescent blue letters proclaiming "Icemule Theater."
